t: Amazon vs. USAGundamStore | Fandom - The Gundam Wiki
s: Is it better to order off Amazon or USAGundamStore? ... USA gundam store tends to have better prices plus you can get 10% off with the code ZakuAurelius10. However, if you have amazon prime, amazon tends to be a equal or a little cheaper. I have also had good luck at my local hobby shop.
